nodes.text: The E-STAP Shielded Droid Starbomber was a model of automated bomber employed by the Trade Federation and equipped with a deflector shield generator. It was thus an improvement upon the original, unshielded E-STAP Droid Starbomber, though it is not known to have been fielded by the Federation on many occasions.
It was superseded by the E-STAP Advanced Droid Starbomber.
